languages.text: "Прогоняете? Сейчас?" {n}От взгляда Кассии сводит скулы — как от кислого цитруса.{/n} "А, впрочем, неважно. Не смею беспокоить, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Прогоняете? Сейчас?" {n}От взгляда Кассии сводит скулы — как от кислого цитруса.{/n} "А, впрочем, неважно. Не смею беспокоить, Лорд-капитан".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Прогоняете? Сейчас?" {n}От взгляда Кассии сводит скулы — как от кислого цитруса.{/n} "А, впрочем, неважно. Не смею беспокоить, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's glare makes your face writhe like a sour citrus would.{/n} "Although... Nevermind. I dare not take more of your time, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's glare makes your face writhe like a sour citrus would.{/n} "Although... Nevermind. I dare not take more of your time, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你要把我赶走吗？偏偏是现在？”{n}卡西娅的神情让你不忍直视，仿佛你刚刚尝了一口酸涩的柑橘。{/n}“不过……不要紧。我不敢继续占用你的时间了，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “你要把我赶走吗？偏偏是现在？”{n}卡西娅的神情让你不忍直视，仿佛你刚刚尝了一口酸涩的柑橘。{/n}“不过……不要紧。我不敢继续占用你的时间了，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Me pide que me vaya? ¿Ahora?». {n}La mirada de Cassia hace que te estremezcas como si hubieras probado un cítrico agrio.{/n} «Pero... No importa, no quiero ocupar más su tiempo, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «¿Me pide que me vaya? ¿Ahora?». {n}La mirada de Cassia hace que te estremezcas como si hubieras probado un cítrico agrio.{/n} «Pero... No importa, no quiero ocupar más su tiempo, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしを追い出すのですか？今？」{n}カシアの表情は、まるで酸っぱい柑橘類を味わったかのように、あなたをうろたえさせる。{/n}「ですが…お気になさらずに。これ以上お時間は取らせませんことよ、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしを追い出すのですか？今？」{n}カシアの表情は、まるで酸っぱい柑橘類を味わったかのように、あなたをうろたえさせる。{/n}「ですが…お気になさらずに。これ以上お時間は取らせませんことよ、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr schickt mich weg? Jetzt?" {n}Cassias Blick lässt dich zusammenfahren, als hättest du gerade in eine Zitrone gebissen.{/n} "Obwohl ... ach, vergesst es. Ich wage es nicht, noch mehr Eurer Zeit zu beanspruchen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr schickt mich weg? Jetzt?" {n}Cassias Blick lässt dich zusammenfahren, als hättest du gerade in eine Zitrone gebissen.{/n} "Obwohl ... ach, vergesst es. Ich wage es nicht, noch mehr Eurer Zeit zu beanspruchen, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous me congédiez ? Maintenant ? » {n}Vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de grimacer devant le regard de Cassia, comme si vous veniez de mordre dans un citron particulièrement acide.{/n} « Mais... Non, qu'importe. Je ne vous ferai pas perdre plus de temps, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me congédiez ? Maintenant ? » {n}Vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de grimacer devant le regard de Cassia, comme si vous veniez de mordre dans un citron particulièrement acide.{/n} « Mais... Non, qu'importe. Je ne vous ferai pas perdre plus de temps, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Beni gönderiyor musun? Şimdi mi?" {n}Cassia'nın bakışları, ekşi bir narenciye tatmışsın gibi yüzünün buruşmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Neyse. Daha fazla zamanını almayayım Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "You are sending me away? Now?" {n}Cassia's look makes you wince as though you've just tasted sour citrus.{/n} "Although... Never mind. I dare not take up any more of your time, Lord Captain."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
